body.name: Projector with WiFi and Bluetooth, Mini Portable Projector with Bag, Native 1080P Projector for indoor or outdoor movie ues, Compatible with Phone/Laptop/TV Stick/PS5
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 6 hrs 6 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 17 hrs 6 mins
features: Native 1080P FHD Visuals: Witness stunning visuals with a true 1920x1080p resolution, delivering a remarkable viewing experience. The projector boasts 11000lux brightness, a 10000:1 high contrast ratio, and 90% brightness uniformity for vivid and clear displays. The projector also comes with a bag.

Dual-band WiFi & Bluetooth 5.1: Experience seamless screen mirroring and fast online streaming with dual-band 2.4G and 5G WiFi. The Bluetooth 5.1 capability ensures easy wireless audio connections to speakers or earbuds. Compatible with Android, iOS, and laptops, this projector offers versatile connectivity options.

Zoom Function & Easy Setup for Large Screens: Effortlessly adjust the image size from 100% to 75% without moving the projector, thanks to the zoom function. Setting up a cinematic experience is quick and easy, allowing you to project anywhere from 50'' to 250''. The minimum recommended distance is 5.5ft for optimal viewing.

Integrated HiFi Stereo for Immersive Audio: Immerse yourself in high-fidelity sound through the built-in stereo surround speakers. With a powerful 6W output, the projector provides a superior audio experience. Enjoy long-lasting entertainment with a lamp life of up to 100,000 hours.

First Class Customer Service: Register your JQ450 projector for extended support (12 to 24 months). Benefit from personalized assistance via phone or email. FEBFOXS provides worry-free replacements and exceptional customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Picture, easy setup
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently purchased two of the FEBFOXS Projectors, and I am absolutely thrilled with my purchase! This mini portable projector has exceeded my expectations in every way.The native 1080P resolution delivers stunningly clear and vibrant images, whether I'm using it for indoor movie nights or enjoying an outdoor screening with friends. The picture quality is crisp, sharp, and provides an immersive viewing experience that rivals larger, more expensive projectors.One of the standout features for me is the built-in WiFi and Bluetooth capabilities. Connecting my phone, laptop, TV stick, or even my PS5 to the projector was a breeze. The wireless options make it incredibly convenient to stream content from various devices without the hassle of cables and wires.The compact size of the projector, coupled with the included carrying bag, makes it perfect for on-the-go entertainment. I can easily take it to a friend's house, set up a movie night in the backyard, or bring it along for presentations.The versatility of this projector is truly impressive. It seamlessly adapts to different devices and settings, offering a wide range of possibilities for entertainment and professional use. The ease of setup and user-friendly interface make it accessible for everyone, even those who are not tech-savvy.The FEBFOXS Projector has outstanding performance, wireless connectivity, and portability make it a top-notch choice for anyone in need of a reliable and high-quality projector. I wholeheartedly give it a 5-star rating and highly recommend it to anyone in the market for a versatile and top-of-the-line projector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for what I used it for.
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical about purchasing a budget projector. However, it turned out to be just what I needed for our Halloween display.This is not the type of projector you would want for an amazing home or back yard theater experience. It is a simple low budget projector.Being able to cast from my device as well as being able to connect to a bigger speaker worked out great though. The picture was bright and clear being cast through the window at night. The Bluetooth easily reached an outdoor speaker.This would be a nice little portable projector to take along or gift for a student. It has a built speaker that is actually pretty ok. And it is inexpensive enough that if it is dropped, lost, seized by this new fangled over zealous fbi, or stolen that it isn't a huge loss.I will most likely purchase a second one to expand the display.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great projector, hard to clean.
reviews.reviewText: Great projector, very bright! So the lens burns easily if left on, always turn off when not in use to avoid that. Inside gets very dusty quick, it does have a removable dust filter, but i still have a lot of dust built up inside and its starting to effect the image and my house is super clean/nothing else is dusty like this thing... it sucks a lot of air through it. I can't find a way to open it up and clean it out yet, but not even sure if its safe to do so. Overall it was fantastic for about 2-3 months, and now its pretty ugly. I'd go with one thats easier to clean next time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant about the quality of the product as the price as so low but I was surprised to find out the picture quality was very good. its easy to setup and wether you connect via wifi or hdmi cables, both are simple and quick connections. overall I am extremely satisfied with the quality and you cant beat the price. also, having a remote is a very nice touch so one doesn't have to get up and down to change the volume., I would highly recommend this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars one of the best for the price
reviews.reviewText: This is one the best projectors out there for the price it have,i love the image quality and the variety of ports.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For a cheap projector this works fine. It has the functionality that I wish some more expensive projectors have. The only couple of things that I wish this had was a brighter video, quieter fan although the fan noise is mostly covered up by the volume of the blue tooth speaker I have connected to it.I like the menu structure. Easy to set up and navigate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It says 'portable projector', but what they mean is that it's a little small-ish and they give you a little bag to carry it in. You cannot bring it outdoors or play it anywhere without wall outlet power--it does not charge. Hoping anyone trying to find a portable projector sees this so they don't make the same mistake I did.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked First Time, and It Worked Right!
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical. My wife purchased a different brand projector from this one and had a bad experience. Not so with this device! The projector was packed very well, simple. Unpacking was a breeze. I like simple. You will need two AAA batteries for the remote. Hook up was intuitive. You basically plug it in, focus, and read the easy-to-follow on-screen instructions. First, I connected it to my laptop using one of the projector’s two HDMI ports. I selected the input port from the on-screen menu. The device auto-interfaced. I like simple. I had a projected screen in seconds. The sound augmented my laptop's speaker system very well. My wife checked it out and was very pleased with the picture resolution. She brought out her phone and we Screen Mirrored, wireless. Photos and streaming. Again, selected the function, auto-interfaced. Simple. I can’t ask for more than that from a device. Nicely done, and very pleased with this device.

I have had this projector for an over six months. I rarely or never use it. The only problem is the fan is so loud. And you can barely concentrate on what you are watching cause it annoying to be hearing that loud noise alongside the audio. I tried wrapping it with a clothe or a stuffy. But it doesn’t work help at all. Looking for how to sell it and purchase another one.

reviews.reviewTitle: Calida precio, vale mucho la pena
reviews.reviewText: Me quedé impresionado con la calidad de imágen, lo recomiendo mucho, creo que superó mis espectativas, ya casi no uso mi pantalla jajajaja

Watching movies or anything with this projector is pointless. The fan inside is so loud that it's all I can hear. Maybe I got a defective version? Otherwise it works properly... but that fan is awful.

reviews.reviewTitle: Es un excelente proyector buena calidad de imagen buen brillo me encanto
reviews.reviewText: Buena calidad de imagen buen brillo esta excelente
Buen díaMi proyector funciona muy bien, me encanta :)
